text: distracted driving is dangerous until
now driver monitoring solutions which
track behavior and alert distracted
drivers required in vehicle data
processing making them expensive hard to
upgrade quickly outdated and out of
reach for the mass market but what if we
leverage the latest technologies to
innovate a better approach Amazon Web
Services Vodafone and Saguna worked
together on an innovative prototype
bringing edge cloud computing to smart
camera services like driver monitoring
and offloading computing resources from
the car here is a glimpse into the
technology video feeds a stream to the
edge of Vodafone's 4G LTE network where
sakuni's multi access edge computing
m.a.c solution directs the stream to AWS
Greengrass and machine learning
inference capabilities for analysis
by operating inside the network to get
close to the connected car this low
latency solution can prevent accidents
with real-time alerts while lowering the
in vehicle Bill of Materials reducing
cost with shared resources continuing to
benefit from technology improvements and
scaling the service this makes new
services economical and relevant to the
mass-market making any vehicle smarter
serving as a catalyst for business

applicable approach that promotes safety
and opens a wide range of possibilities
